summary: Modifies the explosive steel and Dwemer bolts so they don\'t get mixed with the regular variant. Also includes Dwemer quiver.
descriptionHtml:
Introduction-
*After uploading this file I found another mod that changes the Dwemer quiver just as mine does. by Ashigi. Though I did not use his version I felt that I should give him a shout out since his was here first. Either version should work...but if you want to use both of them I guess load his after mine to overwrite my quiver. I am not trying to step all over him but I had not noticed until I uploaded my Version 1.1.*

Hello all!
I have created this mod to address the pressing issue...how in the world does the dawnguard keep all their Xbow bolts organized? This stems from me switching in mid combat to a different ammo type and not noticing, until I fire an elemental bolt into a group of people and realizing that I had just pissed everyone off and now they are trying to kill me. 

This mod replaces the vanilla exploding STEEL bolt textures with something that I whipped up real quick to try and help myself notice the difference in the bolts.

To Install-
extract everything into the Skyrim folder, is should work itself out...I think I put everything in the right order. (not sure how to set up mods for the mod manager...probably real simple too.)

Future plans-
-Dwemer bolts (finished)
-Custom Crossbows
-Custom bolts
-more magic effects
-clean up images

Permissions-
You all can use this as you see fit. if you do use it in another mod, please just put a little nod to me. nothing special needed really.


And of course thank you Bethesda for the game...and FINALLY releasing Dawnguard to the PC community.
author: Otakufiend
